intent_template: The person in the video {description}. Can you add {description2} to my wishlist?
intent: The person in the video mentions another phone type besides Android. Can you add the cheapest phone from that brand to my wishlist?
intermediate_intent: What was the other phone type besides Android the person in the video mentions?

instantiation_dict.description: mentions another phone type besides Android
instantiation_dict.description2: the cheapest phone from that brand

must_include: Apple iPhone 8, US Version, 64GB, Gold - AT&T (Renewed)
